meanings.definition: The quality of having a ready insight into things; shrewdness.
meanings.sent1: Her perspicacity in solving problems amazed everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: His perspicacity in business matters helped him make wise decisions.
meanings.sent3: With her perspicacity, she could always find the best deals while shopping.
meanings.sent4: His perspicacity was like a sharp sword cutting through the confusion.
meanings.sent5: The detective's perspicacity led to the quick resolution of the case.

meanings.definition: The ability to understand things quickly and make accurate judgments.
meanings.sent1: The student's perspicacity in grasping complex concepts impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: Her perspicacity in analyzing data made her a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent3: His perspicacity in choosing the right path always saved him from trouble.
meanings.sent4: The captain's perspicacity in navigation guided the ship safely through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's perspicacity uncovered the hidden patterns in the research data.
